description: Taco Tuesday can be everyday when you combine Old El Paso Mexican favourites with a coleslaw kit and Perfect Italiano cheese.
name: Quick Black-Bean Tacos Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 cans Old El Paso black beans 425g, drained
1 pkt Old El Paso Veggie Soft Taco Kit 376g
1 pkt Woolworths American BBQ coleslaw kit 450g
2 cups Perfect Italiano 4 Cheese Melt shredded cheese
0.25 bunch coriander, leaves picked, to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add beans and both spice mixes from taco kit to pan. Stir to combine.
Cook beans, stirring occasionally, for 4 minutes or until warmed through.
Meanwhile, warm kit tortillas in the microwave, according to package directions.
Assemble colelaw kit. Fill tortillas with spiced beans, slaw and cheese. Sprinkle with coriander.
